T04bsa009_u:2: namaḥ trailokye vyavahāramātre sati paramarthābhimānāt tattvārthānavagāhibhiḥ sattvairvastusvabhāvavivekadvāreṇāviparyayajñānasaṃprāptaye śāstraracaneyaṃ
T04bsa009_u:4: tadaṃśān vīkṣya tatrāpi bhrāntā buddhirahāviva // Hvpv_1 (6) //
T04bsa009_u:8: bhrāntamatramataḥ prājñair na cintyaṃ paramārthataḥ // Hvpv_3 (45) //
T04bsa009_u:9: bhrāntaṃ tadapya samyaktvad yathā bhanaṃ tathāsti na /
T04bsa009_u:12: tyajet sa buddhiman suṣthurāgādyahibhayaṃ yathā // Hvpv_5 //
T04bsa009_u:14: kleśan sarvasaṃ tyaktumana yateta paramārthataḥ // Hvpv_6 //
